title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Aponte J (2024). repana: Repeatable Analysis R. R package version 2.0.0, https://johnaponte.github.io/repana/, https://github.com/johnaponte/repana.
code: @Manual{,   title = {repana: Repeatable Analysis in R},   author = {John J. Aponte},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 2.0.0, https://johnaponte.github.io/repana/},   url = {https://github.com/johnaponte/repana}, }

title: Repeatable Analysis in R
text: Reproducible research crucial aspect scientific process, especially data science. ensures inputs, including data, libraries, user programs, consistently produce results artifacts. enhances credibility research also streamlines collaboration makes easier verify build upon previous work. several options R achieve reproducible research repanafacilitates pursuit reproducible research.

title: Repeatable Analysis in R
text: Repana R package designed simplify process conducting reproducible research. provides structured framework managing R projects, ensuring research artifacts, new datasets, tables, figures, listings, reports, remain consistent across runs. Repana’s opinionated structure can customized fit specific needs, core principles revolve around concept reproducibility.

title: Repeatable Analysis in R
text: Structured Workflow: Repana enforces opinionated structure project. function make_strucutre() helps creation structure. Standardize project structures documentation help understand workflow facilitates collaboration Master Function: heart Repana master() function. function executes programs working directory whose names start two numbers underscore (e.g., 00_xxx, 01_xxx, 02_xxx, etc.) intended order. automated execution ensures research workflow standardized can easily reproduced. R scripts compiled scripts notebook using rmarkdown. help programmer concentrate programming allow document code produce HTML, PDF MS Word files document execution program. program executed independent environment prevent unintended interference programs, ensuring research remains truly reproducible Artifact Management: Repana provides function clean_structure()included first program (usually 00_clean.R) delete recreate directories artifacts saved. action guarantees artifacts presented directories created current run, eliminating risk using outdated versions previous runs. Database Configuration: realm data science, databases often crucial component research. Repana allows configure databases within project, making easier manage access data sources. Git Friendliness: Repana GIT-friendly. helps keep track source information user programs without including generated artifacts GIT repository. ensures version control system focuses essential aspects research.

what: How to Get Started with Repana
title: Repeatable Analysis in R
text: get started Repana, follow steps: Installation: can install Repana CRAN using install.packages("Repana") want use developing version git-hub devtools::install_github("johnaponte/repana", build_manual = T, build_vignettes = T) Project Setup: Create new project use repana::make_structure() construct opinionated structure required Repana. Customize needed fit research requirements modifying config.ymlfile. Programming: Write R programs, ensuring follow naming conventions (e.g., 00_xxx, 01_xxx, etc.). using RStudio IDE use Repana insert template addin include consistent head documentation project. Options head template allows include timestamp signature created document packages used execution program. Artifact Management: Ensure first program include clean_stucture()function. default, make_structure() function creates one 00_clean.R. execution clean_structure re-create directories dependencies saved. directories defined config.yml file Execute Programs: Utilize master() function run programs intended order, keeping research consistent reproducible. default master() executes programs default directory follow naming convention, may use start stop options execute set deve Documentation Collaboration: Document work using provided templates collaborate seamlessly team broader research community. information see: Defining structure Database configuration Modifying template Creating reports

title: repana 2.0.0
text: Modified format NEWS.md file track changes package. Modify documentation package level requested CRAN Allow change template file project Simplify template file pkgdown used create website package github Change way timestamp manage. need anymore include start end within program. Custom YAML tags now control session info signature injected code Master now works default spin option. User format txt option txt output Make structure now produce 00_clean.R instead 01_clean.R Simplified pattern manager programs. Now programs format nn_ included default list programs executed master Default db changed SQLite duckdb duckdb similar functionality, R friendly preserver factors dates (see https://duckdb.org/)
